title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Skills: Problem-Based Learning Course for Immersive 3D Design Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Solve science-integrated design problems via problem-based learning (PBL) in 3D virtual environments
Collaboratively create prototypes using 3D design tools (e.g., OpenSimulator) and experience feedback processes
Self-assess immersion (flow) experiences during design activities and derive improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
